# Problem 12.1 - Equations {.unnumbered}

## Problem Statement

A point in a beam is subjected to the state of stress shown, where σ<sub>x</sub> = 20 ksi, σ<sub>y</sub> = 35 ksi, and τ<sub>xy</sub> = 15 ksi. Determine the normal stress acting on plane a-a if angle Θ = 25°.
